meta.author: Jerome Lanteri
meta.application: Source Code Maker (infos) by freelanc web site
meta.description: Let me show you example of my job's done and feel welcome to hire me up there.
meta.keywords: SourceCodeMaker, Web-designer, Applications designer, Android Applications designer, Freelance remote developper

share.nextcloud: Share with me on my cloud

home.title: Description
home.content:
Welcome to my web site.

My name is Jérôme Lanteri and i'm french dev freelance. This web site is build with Express.js backend simple framework and React.js frontend framework.

I can also build other backend code with Ruby (Rails-5 framework) or Python-3 (Flask or Django-3 framework). I can link them as you want with any ORM database (MySQL/MariaDB, Postgresql, MongoDB).

I can install your web site on a remote server for you on Nginx http server

email.correct_error: Please choose a valid email syntax

username.label: Username
username.correct_error: username should be unique and up to 3 chars long.
username.helper: Your username can be used to login, then choose a nice one and write it on your private notebook.

second_name.label: Second name
second_name.correct_error: Your second name should be acceptable.

tooltip.on: Click to be able to update your password, then follow instructions to apply update.

password.helper: Password doesn't print for safety reason. You can modify it by first click the button upper...

first.label: New password
first.helper: Password has to have minimum (each of them): [1 uppercase, 1 lowercase, 1 number, 1 special] character

second.label: Confirm new password
second.helper: If password doesn't correzpond to first one, you will not be able to update password

helper.title: Should contain between 3 and 64 chars, start with high cap, never end with a space and no injected code
helper.content: Content should be HTML tag able withjout any code injection

header.title: Create your account
header.intro: Come on, let's try to be a wonderful user there in this fantastic web site...
header.description: After to register, you will have to check your email box and click the link to confirm registration to set this account enable

email.label: Your email of this account
email.helper: I will never share your email with anyone else

password.label: Your password
password.helper: total of 8 characters minimum, with a number, a special character, low cap and high cap character inside required

password_repeat.label: Repeat same password
password_repeat.helper: control that your password entered up there is the same as you would like

failed.title: Email account validation
failed.content: Email validation failed to be sent to your account email address. Email will not be modified.

change.text:
You can edit email, but after to submit, you will have to click to the link receipt on the new email box within 2 days to apply the new email changed

An email will be sent to the old email to signal the edition with a link to cancel the change.
change.title: Process to change email

succeed.title: Reset password process running
succeed.content: You should receipt an email with a linkt o follow.

failed.title: Process to reset password failed
failed.content: Email with link has not been sent. A problem did occur.

password.modify: Password has been changed, you need to validate to apply.

password.title: Setup your new password
password.subtitle: 8 characteres minimum, some upper cases and lower casses chars, a spécial char

first.label: Your new password identique copy
first.description: Your password should be difficult to find, and to hold.

second.label: Confirm your password
second.description: Second password should be same as first one.

error.name: Failed to setup password
error.message: Password confirmed is not the same than password setup.

success.title: Setup new password success
